titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Piero Sraffa, [29. 6. 1939]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Abschrift McGuinness, Kopie in BA. Publiziert (WiC, S. 304).

div.p: Dear Sraffa, Things are going all right with me so far, but I am greatly worried about my sisters. I should be very grateful to you if you would let me know any piece of news you think I ought to know & donâ€™t; if necessary by wire. Please remember me to your mother.
